max_length: The field length must be less than or equal to {{maxLength}}
min_length: The field length must be greater than or equal to {{minLength}}
min: The field value needs to be greater than {{min}}
max: The field value needs to be less than {{max}}
range: This field must be from {{min}} to {{max}}
date_yyyy_mm: The month year format is invalid (yyyy-mm)
date_mm_yyyy: The month year format is invalid (mm-yyyy)
bank: The bank number format is invalid
number: This field must be a valid number
text: This field must be a valid text
confirm_password: Confirm password not match new password
break_time: The break time must in range from {{fromTime}} to {{toTime}}
same_time: The time from {{fromTime}} to {{toTime}} is same another available
date_greater_than_7_days: Date range must not greater than {{numberDay}} days
password: Password must contain at least {{numberCapitalLetter}} capital letter and {{numberCharacter}} numeric character
digit: Value must be an integer with up to {{o}} digits
date_future: Date should be the current or future date
postal_code: {{fieldName}} is not in the correct postal code format.
rangeEvaluation: The value of this field must be within 1-5
limitMinuteOvertime: Minute value must be less than 60
